document_data.name: the Order of the Fiery Heart
document_data.orgname: the Order of the Fiery Heart
document_data.mainbody: The '''Order of the Fiery Heart''' was part of the standing army of the [[efreet]] in the [[City of Brass]] on the [[Elemental Plane of Fire]].
document_data.Organization: This elite unit numbered 500 [[griffon]]-riding troops. Many of the members were [[Noble efreeti|efreet nobles]], and even efreet priests or [[sorcerer]]s.
document_data.Activities:
The Order of the Fiery Heart was trusted with the most important missions for the [[Marrake al-Sidan al-Hariq ben Lazan|Sultan]].

They served a wide range of roles, depending on the mission. Great honors were bestowed upon members of this unit, up to and including marriage to one of the Sultan's daughters.
document_data.Base of Operations: The City of Brass served as the base of the Order of the Fiery Heart.
